verses.verse: תִּקְע֨וּ <S%H8628><s%> Blow שׁוֹפָ֜ר <S%H7782><s%> ye the trumpet בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion וְהָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> and sound an alarm בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> in my holy יִרְגְּז֕וּ <S%H7264><s%> tremble כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> let all the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> cometh יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> for the day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Surely קָרֽוֹב׃ <S%H7138><s%> for [it is] nigh at hand

י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> A day חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness וַאֲפֵלָ֗ה <S%H653><s%> and of gloominess י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day עָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> of clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֔ל <S%H6205><s%> and of thick darkness כְּשַׁ֖חַר <S%H7837><s%> as the morning פָּרֻ֣שׂ <S%H6566><s%> spread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> people רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> a great וְעָצ֔וּם <S%H6099><s%> and a strong כָּמֹ֗הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִֽהְיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> there hath not been מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָ֣עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> after לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3254><s%> the like neither shall be any more עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8141><s%> it [even] to the years דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אָ֣כְלָה <S%H398><s%> devoureth אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> A fire וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> them and behind תְּלַהֵ֣ט <S%H3857><s%> burneth לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <S%H3852><s%> them a flame כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> [is] as the garden עֵ֨דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> them and behind מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> wilderness שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> them a desolate וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> all פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> yea and nothing shall escape לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and nothing הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לּֽוֹ׃

כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> The appearance סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> of horses מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <S%H4758><s%> of them [is] as the appearance וּכְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> and as horsemen כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so יְרוּצֽוּן׃ <S%H7323><s%> so shall they run

כְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Like the noise מַרְכָּב֗וֹת <S%H4818><s%> of chariots עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> on the tops הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> of mountains יְרַקֵּד֔וּן <S%H7540><s%> shall they leap כְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> like the noise לַ֣הַב <S%H3851><s%> of a flame אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire אֹכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> that devoureth קָ֑שׁ <S%H7179><s%> the stubble כְּעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people עָצ֔וּם <S%H6099><s%> as a strong עֱר֖וּךְ <S%H6186><s%> array מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> set in battle

מִפָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> Before their face יָחִ֣ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> shall be much pained עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> all faces קִבְּצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> shall gather פָארֽוּר׃ <S%H6289><s%> blackness

כְּגִבּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H1368><s%> like mighty men יְרֻצ֔וּן <S%H7323><s%> They shall run כְּאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> every one מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war יַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> they shall climb חוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> on his ways יֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <S%H1980><s%> march וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְעַבְּט֖וּן <S%H5670><s%> and they shall not break אֹרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H734><s%> their ranks

וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Neither shall one אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> another לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִדְחָק֔וּן <S%H1766><s%> thrust גֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> every one בִּמְסִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H4546><s%> in his path יֵֽלֵכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> march וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> through הַשֶּׁ֛לַח <S%H7973><s%> upon the sword יִפֹּ֖לוּ <S%H5307><s%> and [when] they fall לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִבְצָֽעוּ׃ <S%H1214><s%> they shall not be wounded

בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city יָשֹׁ֗קּוּ <S%H8264><s%> They shall run to and fro בַּֽחוֹמָה֙ <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall יְרֻצ֔וּן <S%H7323><s%> they shall run בַּבָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> upon the houses יַעֲל֑וּ <S%H5927><s%> they shall climb up בְּעַ֧ד <S%H1157><s%> through הַחַלּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H2474><s%> at the windows יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> they shall enter in כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <S%H1590><s%> like a thief

לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before רָ֣גְזָה <S%H7264><s%> shall quake אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth רָעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> shall tremble שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> them the heavens שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> the sun וְיָרֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon קָדָ֔רוּ <S%H6937><s%> shall be dark וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> and the stars אָסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> shall withdraw נָגְהָֽם׃ <S%H5051><s%> their shining

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> shall utter קוֹלוֹ֙ <S%H6963><s%> his voice לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> army כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely רַ֤ב <S%H7227><s%> great מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> [is] very מַחֲנֵ֔הוּ <S%H4264><s%> for his camp כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> is indeed עָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> for [he is] strong עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that executeth דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely גָד֧וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> for the day יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְנוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> terrible מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> and very וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> can יְכִילֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3557><s%> and who can abide

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> Therefore also now saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> turn עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> with בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> ye [even] to me with all your heart וּבְצ֥וֹם <S%H6685><s%> and with fasting וּבְבְכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> and with weeping וּבְמִסְפֵּֽד׃ <S%H4553><s%> and with mourning

וְקִרְע֤וּ <S%H7167><s%> And rend לְבַבְכֶם֙ <S%H3824><s%> your heart וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not בִּגְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H899><s%> and not your garments וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חַנּ֤וּן <S%H2587><s%> for he [is] gracious וְרַחוּם֙ <S%H7349><s%> and merciful ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and of great חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וְנִחָ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> and repenteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> him of the evil

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יוֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> Who knoweth יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> [if] he will return וְנִחָ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> and repent וְהִשְׁאִ֤יר <S%H7604><s%> and leave אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> behind בְּרָכָ֔ה <S%H1293><s%> a blessing מִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> him [even] a meat offering וָנֶ֔סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> and a drink offering לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> angels פ

תִּקְע֥וּ <S%H8628><s%> Blow שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion קַדְּשׁוּ־ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify צ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast קִרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> call עֲצָרָֽה׃ <S%H6116><s%> a solemn assembly

אִסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> Gather עָ֞ם <S%H5971><s%> the people קַדְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify קָהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> the congregation קִבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> assemble זְקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> the elders אִסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> gather עֽוֹלָלִ֔ים <S%H5768><s%> the children וְיֹנְקֵ֖י <S%H3243><s%> and those that suck שָׁדָ֑יִם <S%H7699><s%> the breasts יֵצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> go forth חָתָן֙ <S%H2860><s%> let the bridegroom מֵֽחֶדְר֔וֹ <S%H2315><s%> of his chamber וְכַלָּ֖ה <S%H3618><s%> and the bride מֵחֻפָּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H2646><s%> out of her closet

בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between הָאוּלָם֙ <S%H197><s%> between the porch וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar יִבְכּוּ֙ <S%H1058><s%> weep הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> Let the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <S%H8334><s%> the ministers יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְֽיֹאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> and let them say ח֧וּסָה <S%H2347><s%> Spare יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עַמֶּ֗ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and give נַחֲלָתְךָ֤ <S%H5159><s%> not thine heritage לְחֶרְפָּה֙ <S%H2781><s%> to reproach לִמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> should rule over בָּ֣ם גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> that the heathen לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> them wherefore should they say בָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> Where אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

וַיְקַנֵּ֥א <S%H7065><s%> be jealous יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Then will the LORD לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> for his land וַיַּחְמֹ֖ל <S%H2550><s%> and pity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> will answer יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yea the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and say לְעַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שֹׁלֵ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> you corn וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> and oil וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7646><s%> and ye shall be satisfied אֹת֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> and I וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> therewith and I will no more make אֶתְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again חֶרְפָּ֖ה <S%H2781><s%> you a reproach בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצְּפוֹנִ֞י <S%H6830><s%> from you the northern אַרְחִ֣יק <S%H7368><s%> But I will remove far off מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and I וְהִדַּחְתִּיו֮ <S%H5080><s%> [army] and will drive אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> him into a land צִיָּ֣ה <S%H6723><s%> barren וּשְׁמָמָה֒ <S%H8077><s%> and desolate אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and its פָּנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> with his face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> toward the east וְסֹפ֖וֹ <S%H5490><s%> and his hinder part אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הָאַֽחֲר֑וֹן <S%H314><s%> toward the utmost וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up בָאְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H889><s%> and his stink וְתַ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> shall come up צַחֲנָת֔וֹ <S%H6709><s%> and his ill savour כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִגְדִּ֖יל <S%H1431><s%> great things לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> because he hath done

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <S%H3372><s%> Fear אֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> not O land גִּ֣ילִי <S%H1523><s%> be glad וּשְׂמָ֔חִי <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִגְדִּ֥יל <S%H1431><s%> great things יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> will do

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid בַּהֲמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> ye beasts שָׂדַ֔י <S%H7704><s%> of the field כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for דָשְׁא֖וּ <S%H1876><s%> do spring נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> for the pastures מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> for the tree נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> beareth פִרְי֔וֹ <S%H6529><s%> her fruit תְּאֵנָ֥ה <S%H8384><s%> the fig tree וָגֶ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> and the vine נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> do yield חֵילָֽם׃ <S%H2426><s%> army

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> then ye children צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion גִּ֤ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> Be glad וְשִׂמְחוּ֙ <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> for he hath given לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H4175><s%> you the former rain לִצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> moderately וַיּ֣וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> and he will cause to come down לָכֶ֗ם גֶּ֛שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> for you the rain מוֹרֶ֥ה <S%H4175><s%> the former rain וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> and the latter rain בָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> in the first

וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> shall be full הַגֳּרָנ֖וֹת <S%H1637><s%> And the floors בָּ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> of wheat וְהֵשִׁ֥יקוּ <S%H7783><s%> shall overflow הַיְקָבִ֖ים <S%H3342><s%> and the fats תִּיר֥וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> with wine וְיִצְהָֽר׃ <S%H3323><s%> and oil

וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֤י <S%H7999><s%> And I will restore לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> to you the years אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> hath eaten הָֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H697><s%> that the locust הַיֶּ֖לֶק <S%H3218><s%> the cankerworm וְהֶחָסִ֣יל <S%H2625><s%> and the caterpiller וְהַגָּזָ֑ם <S%H1501><s%> and the palmerworm חֵילִי֙ <S%H2426><s%> army הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> my great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שִׁלַּ֖חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> which I sent בָּכֶֽם׃

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> And ye shall eat אָכוֹל֙ <S%H398><s%> in plenty וְשָׂב֔וֹעַ <S%H7646><s%> and be satisfied וְהִלַּלְתֶּ֗ם <S%H1984><s%> and praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that hath dealt עִמָּכֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with לְהַפְלִ֑יא <S%H6381><s%> wondrously וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> with you and my people לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> shall never

וִידַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> I am in בְקֶ֤רֶב <S%H7130><s%> that I [am] in the midst יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I וַאֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> and [that] I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> other וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> and none else and my people לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> shall never ס

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it shall come to pass afterward כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> this אֶשְׁפּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> [that] I will pour out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּחִי֙ <S%H7307><s%> my spirit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> upon all flesh וְנִבְּא֖וּ <S%H5012><s%> shall prophesy בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> and your sons וּבְנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1323><s%> and your daughters זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2205><s%> your old men חֲלֹמ֣וֹת <S%H2492><s%> shall dream יַחֲלֹמ֔וּן <S%H2472><s%> dreams בַּח֣וּרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H970><s%> your young men חֶזְיֹנ֖וֹת <S%H2384><s%> visions יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall see

וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> Even עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָֽעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> And also upon the servants וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשְּׁפָח֑וֹת <S%H8198><s%> and upon the handmaids בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> in those days הָהֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those אֶשְׁפּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> will I pour out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּחִֽי׃ <S%H7307><s%> my spirit

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> And I will shew מֽוֹפְתִ֔ים <S%H4159><s%> wonders בַּשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the earth דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> and fire וְתִֽימֲר֖וֹת <S%H8490><s%> and pillars עָשָֽׁן׃ <S%H6227><s%> of smoke

הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> The sun יֵהָפֵ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> shall be turned לְחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> into darkness וְהַיָּרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon לְדָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> into blood לִפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before בּ֚וֹא <S%H935><s%> come י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great וְהַנּוֹרָֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> and the terrible

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כֹּ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יִקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] whosoever shall call בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> on the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִמָּלֵ֑ט <S%H4422><s%> shall be delivered כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> on בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> for in mount צִיּ֨וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come פְלֵיטָ֗ה <S%H6413><s%> shall be deliverance כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וּבַ֨שְּׂרִידִ֔ים <S%H8300><s%> and in the remnant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD קֹרֵֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> shall call
